explanation: [0-0] On a football field, a player in a purple and blue jersey bends over and stands on the field. Several players from the opposing team, wearing white jerseys, line up in front of the goal. The referee stands on the sidelines, with the audience and some billboards visible in the background. At the top of the screen is the white text "G10", and at the bottom of the screen is the white text "GALINHO.FC".

[0-8] Then the player in the purple and blue jersey runs forward and kicks the soccer ball in front of him. At the same time, a player in a white jersey lies on the ground, trying to block the shot. However, the ball flies over the wall of players, the goalkeeper flies to save it, and the ball grazes the edge of the goal frame and does not go in. Then the screen switches to the stands, where Messi is sitting and watching the game. He smiles happily.
